verses.verse: (A Song of Ascents.) To Thee I lift <WH5375> up my eyes, <WH5869> O Thou who art enthroned <WH3427> in the heavens! <WH8064>

Behold, <WH2009> as the eyes <WH5869> of servants <WH5650> [look] to the hand <WH3027> of their master, <WH113> As the eyes <WH5869> of a maid <WH8189> to the hand <WH3027> of her mistress; <WH1404> So <WH3651> our eyes <WH5869> [look] to the Lord <WH3068> our God, <WH430> Until <WH5704> He shall be gracious <WH2603> to us.
Be gracious <WH2603> to us, O Lord, <WH3068> be gracious <WH2603> to us; For we are greatly <WH7227> filled <WH7646> with contempt. <WH937>
Our soul <WH5315> is greatly <WH7227> filled <WH7646> With the scoffing <WH3933> of those who <WH7600> are at ease, <WH7600> [And] with the contempt <WH937> of the proud. <WH1349>
